body.name: Bookshelf, 4-tier, Wood & Mesh Kids Book Rack Storage Bookshelf with Wheels, Universal, Vinyl Record Storage

Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 7 hrs 29 mins
features: 【𝑴𝑼𝑳𝑻𝑰𝑭𝑼𝑵𝑪𝑻𝑰𝑶𝑵𝑨𝑳 𝑹𝑨𝑪𝑲】The multifunctional partition design of the book case is perfect for displaying your books,vinyl record, albums, CDs, magazines, video games, manga, novels and more. Vertical storage space keeps books upright - preventing warping and cover damage.

【𝑷𝑬𝑹𝑭𝑬𝑪𝑻 𝑺𝑰𝒁𝑬 𝑭𝑶𝑹 𝑺𝑴𝑨𝑳𝑳 𝑺𝑷𝑨𝑪𝑬】Size: 17.8" L x 11"W x 33" H. With its open design and small footprint, this narrow bookshelf is easy to move and organize, making it ideal for corners and small spaces and perfect for use in living rooms, offices and bedrooms. While saving space, this small bookshelf is also a work of art, suitable as a gift for family or friends.

【𝑺𝑻𝑹𝑶𝑵𝑮 𝑴𝑬𝑻𝑨𝑳 𝑪𝑶𝑵𝑺𝑻𝑹𝑼𝑪𝑻𝑰𝑶𝑵】The bookshelf is made of high-quality board material, which is not easy to break and has a tough and durable texture. Its maximum load-bearing capacity allows you to store your books and items with confidence. (about 50-70 books)

【𝑺𝑻𝑨𝑩𝑳𝑬 𝑨𝑵𝑫 𝑬𝑨𝑺𝒀 𝑻𝑶 𝑴𝑶𝑽𝑬】The VyGrow Bookshelf is designed with 4 wheels, including 2 lockable ones. Simply unlock the wheels to move the bookshelf effortlessly to different rooms or lock them in place for a secure and stationary display.Considering the safety of children and pets, we are equipped with 4 foot pads, which are more stable and safer.

【𝑷𝑹𝑬𝑴𝑰𝑼𝑴 𝑪𝑼𝑺𝑻𝑶𝑴𝑬𝑹 𝑺𝑼𝑷𝑷𝑶𝑹𝑻】We provide 1 year after-sales service for this book shelf organizer. If you have any questions and suggestions about our large bookshelf during installation and use, please feel free to contact us, our customer service team will always be there for you.

ABOUT OUR BRAND VyGrow always puts the improvement of people's quality of life in the first place, and we hope that every customer can find the right home furnishings here!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wish the bookshelf was a bit taller, but overall, this was the best bookshelf for my purposes. It allowed a nice display of magazines (on the top) and books (on the bottom) to make it more inviting to browse and read. Being on wheels adds to the versatility of moving the shelf as needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price Awesome display Good Space saver 👍
reviews.reviewText: For the price you can’t beat it. Buy far the best display and store for your favorite comics and records. Instructions are a little vague but you don’t need to be a rocket surgeon to figure it out.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great portable book shelf!
reviews.reviewText: Great book shelf for my classroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and Mobile
reviews.reviewText: This book shelf has so many uses. I have used it store my books, but also craft items, and office supplies. It is so versatile, depending on what I need it for. One of the aspects that makes it so useful is that it is mobile. You can choose to have it on roller wheels or stationary. I chose it be fully mobile at all times. It rolls super well on hard floor and tile and linoleum, but you really have to take your time and go slow on carpet. It does not seem to take up much space and fits well in smaller rooms. The rollers have brakes on them. I like this because my little boy can’t move the shelf. It seems to have a sturdy frame and is stable.The only bad part of this bookcase is the assembly instructions. They were vague and lacking. There were two types of tools included by the company to put the stand together. There was no mention anywhere in the instructions that I would need a Phillips screwdriver. After struggling for over an hour, I finally asked my husband for help. He is mechanically inclined, and usually has no issues with assembly of even complicated items. He had to try to put it together two different times in two different ways. Finally, he said that we should just use common sense and study the photo on Amazon. He then put it together with the two included tools, a knife and a Phillips screwdriver.There was an extra screw and an extra lug nut. I hope they were supposed to be extra. If the bookcase wasn’t so sturdy and a high quality product, I would have given it four stars for the instructions. Nevertheless, I would advise to not trust the instruction booklet. However, once it is assembled it is well worth the confusion and frustration to have such a unique, sturdy bookshelf.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bit of trouble getting it together......
reviews.reviewText: This little bookshelf is durable. The instructions were just pics and things got a bit backwards when putting it together. We figured it out and it is all good. It is a nice addition for my homeschool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect little spot for the kid’s books
reviews.reviewText: This small bookshelf is the perfect size for holding all of our kid’s board books while also keeping them separate from our other books on our regular shelves. It is short enough that the 11 month old & almost 3 year old can reach the books themselves which is exactly what I was looking for. I do worry sometimes that a kiddo may fall into it or tip it over but so far we’ve been okay. We do have it wedged between other things though so it’s not sticking out at all. And it has wobbled a few times but stays upright. It comes with the option to use wheels or small anti slip feet & since this was for the kiddos we went with the feet for more sturdiness. The wheels do have a locking feature & seem nice but I cannot give an opinion on them since we didn’t use them. Overall it’s very nice, was easy to put together, does not seem flimsy at all, & can be used for a variety of books & other purposes.
